help-file.title: SPAWN
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Summoning
When under the influence of "Spawn", there is the possibility to "Spawn" a creature of Undead from the fresh corpse, who will then take any orders from its maker.
NOTE: This will only occur if the Hellspawn received the killing blow.
